posts.post_title: Want to upgrade my t206 cobb red, bat-off
posts.post_content:
Looking to upgrade my t206 cobb bat-off and t206 cobb red portrait below to a 2 or a 3. I would like to either use the card plus cash to upgrade or upgrade outright. PM or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have any available - thanks!

Pete
